custom_margin=”||19px|||” custom_padding=”||46px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||46px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”40px||46px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

OUT NOW

Based on the bestselling ‘If Women Rose Rooted’

Discover the transformative power of the hidden feminine with this beautiful oracle, and unlock spiritual nourishment, inspiration, and a deeper connection with nature.

Follow the path to unlimited creativity, greater strength and endurance, and create more flow in your life with this magical oracle.

Distilling decades of knowledge and wisdom, Sharon has created a unique and magical oracle that entwines three different threads: Places, Allies, and Journey.

From the inspirational ‘Mountain’ to the flowing ‘River’, you’ll experience the archetypal qualities of place and take spiritual strength from the land. You’ll feel supported by women from Celtic myth and folklore – your Allies – like initiatory Ceridwen and The Cailleach, protector of the wild; and you’ll find Journey cards that reflect the different stages of the Heroine’s Journey and help you follow your unique mythopoetic path through life.

The Rooted Woman Oracle will help you to renew your connection with nature, reclaim your power, and find authentic and meaningful ways of being in this world.

The Rooted Woman Oracle is published by Hay House (an imprint of Penguin Random House). Also available in French from Guy Trédaniel.

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.1″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more
